resources.string:
CodeTime is completely free and open source as this app works only because of Contest List API which is also open source.A big thanks to them (https://clist.by).Check git project here(https://github.com/Ni3verma/CodeTime) and feel free to contribute.

CodeTime uses following libraries:
1) Awesome android support libraries by google.
2) Retrofit, Picasso, Room, Work
3) circle imageView (https://github.com/hdodenhof/CircleImageView)

CodeTime uses logo of some famous platforms such as Hackerrank, Hackerearth, Codeforces, topCoder, Codechef

Various images are downloaded from freepik.com, canva.com, shutterstock.com, uigradients.com, pixabay.com

And finally a big thanks to stackoverflow community and awesome tutorials on youtube and blogs on medium and my udacity android dev nanodegree.

I respect intellectual property of others, and by publishing this app no copyright nor trademark infringement of any sort is intended. If you feel that this app infringes on any of your copyright or trademark, please feel free to mail the issue(canvas.nv@gmail.com)
